title: Use uploaded photo exactly as-is in Home “Our Mission” section

requirements.text: Add the uploaded image file "HR Academy 1-2.jpeg" to the frontend static assets at frontend/public/assets/generated/ and ensure it is stored and served exactly as provided (no resizing, recompression, cropping, filters, metadata stripping, format conversion, or other modifications).

quotes: Use this same exact photo without changing or altering anything in it, use it exactly the way it is

acceptanceCriteria: A file derived from the user upload "HR Academy 1-2.jpeg" exists under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with identical visual content to the upload.
The asset is served directly from the public folder (not through backend blob storage) and is not processed/optimized by any runtime code.
No additional generated/edited variant of the image is created (only a direct copy stored as a static asset).

requirements.text: Update the Home page Mission section ("Our Mission" on the / route) to display the uploaded photo exactly as-is using a direct reference to the copied static asset, and remove any styling that visually alters the image (including but not limited to rounded corners/clipping, overlays, opacity, CSS filters, or object-fit cropping).

quotes: Use this same exact photo without changing or altering anything in it, use it exactly the way it is

acceptanceCriteria: The “Our Mission” section on the Home page renders the uploaded photo from the static asset path in frontend/public/assets/generated/.
The rendered image is not clipped (no border-radius masking), not filtered, and not overlaid; it appears as the original rectangular photo.
The image remains responsive (can scale to container width) without changing aspect ratio or cropping any part of the photo.

constraints: Do not modify, crop, resize, recompress, convert, or otherwise alter the uploaded image content in any step of the build.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep backend architecture as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding new gallery/admin upload flows for this specific image.
Changing any copy/text content outside of what is necessary to display the image exactly as-is.
Storing this image in backend blob storage or adding new backend APIs for it.

required: Wide group photo on an outdoor sports field (hr-academy-1-2-uploaded.dim_1280x360.jpeg)
